generation.comment: Model 'auto' will use the first available model from the server. Override with --generation-model flag.

validation.comment: If model is 'auto' and not specified via --validation-model, will use the same model as generation.

exercise_temperatures.comment: Per-exercise-type temperature overrides. Higher = more creative, lower = more consistent.

generation_settings.comment: lessons_per_combination: Number of lessons to generate per (language, level, topic, exercise_type). max_retries: Retry attempts if generation or validation fails. validation_threshold: Minimum quality score (1-10) to accept. require_unambiguous_fill_in_blank: Reject ambiguous fill-in-blank exercises even if score >= threshold.
